title: Set Up Your Wallet
description: To get started, install a Solana-compatible wallet like Phantom or Solflare. Fund it with SOL to cover transaction fees.

title: Create a Collection
description: Organize your NFTs by creating a collection. Define its name, description, and upload an eye-catching cover image.

title: Add Your NFTs
description: Mint your NFTs by uploading unique artwork, adding metadata, and setting royalties to earn passive income from resales.

title: Sell Your NFTs
description: List your NFTs for sale on the marketplace, set a price, and promote your collection to attract buyers.
